RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Include ZAPLINLK_TOP *---------------------------------------------------------------------* TABLES: sscrfields, e071, tadir.
TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon, trwbo. TYPES td_action TYPE rsmpe-func.
CONSTANTS: c_act_exit TYPE td_action VALUE 'EXIT', c_act_display TYPE td_action VALUE 'DISPLAY'.
TYPES to_objlist TYPE zaplink_gui=>to_list. TYPES to_exception TYPE REF TO zaplink_cx. TYPES t_obj_type TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_comptype. TYPES t_obj_name TYPE zaplink_gui=>td_compname. TYPES td_devc_sk TYPE zaplink_opt_devclass=>td_substitutionkind.
DATA is_selection TYPE trwbo_selection. DATA objlist TYPE to_objlist. DATA o_exception TYPE to_exception. DATA t_def_loc TYPE zaplink_components_contents. DATA t_def_dis TYPE zaplink_components_contents. DATA bdcdata LIKE bdcdata OCCURS 0 WITH HEADER LINE. DATA t_results TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ygpl_delta_analysis_result. DATA t_fields TYPE slis_t_fieldcat_alv.
